name: Basketball Odyssey
description:
Shoot hoops and unlock new worlds on this addictive and relaxing basketball game!

Basketball Odyssey is a different basketball experience. A journey of calm and relaxation due to its music and ambient sounds, while you feel the satisfaction from overcoming a challenge.

Features:
• Complete all hoops to unlock new and challenging worlds.
• Easy one handed controls.
• Play daily challenges. A new basketball world every day!
• Complete the hoops to get stars and rank up!
• 8-bit retro aesthetics with pixel art.
• A wonderful and relaxing soundtrack.
• Casual yet addictive basketball experience.
• Optimised for the latest iOS devices.


_______________________________________________________________________________________________________
PLEASE NOTE! Basketball Odyssey is free to play, but it contains advertising and items that can be purchased for real money.
